description: <p>Using Superfine 16 micron 100% Pure Scheoller Merino Yard, our NEW exclusive jogger design will be your new go-to lounge pant. These PURE Naturals® classics are locally designed for outdoor life in the mountains or at the cabin. </p> <p>Why choose PURE naturals®? Ethical merino ranching in Australia, textile processing by world-famous Schoeller, just down the road from our modern manufacturing partner. 100% superfine (16 micron) merino apparel, made in Europe to our minimal-impact specs. Embrace the PURE naturals® life with sustainable fibers.</p>
name: 100% Merino Wool Drawstring Joggers 260 - Mens
